message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $140 for it.

I understand you're on a budget, Bob. However, I've had other interested buyers, and I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering the product to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $145 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $160, but I'm willing to make a compromise. I'll meet you at $150, and that's my final offer on that price point.
